Mod5_Description: Gain {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} Fury each time {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} deals direct damage to an enemy, or {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} Fury against Elite enemies.
Mod6_Description: After using {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} for {c_number}{SF_14}{/c} seconds, {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_13}* 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage until it is cancelled.
Mod7_Description: While using a Slashing weapon, {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} also inflicts {c_number}[SF_16 * 100|%|]{/c} of its Base damage as Bleeding damage over {c_number}{SF_15}{/c} seconds.
name: Whirlwind
